name: Coin Craze!
description:
You are broke, and have nothing! Luckily your friend has loaned you a few coins with which to make your fortune.

Coin Craze is a game in the style of those old arcade coin pusher games. Drop coins on the table to shove off other coins! Spend coins to upgrade the value of existing coins at random. Fill up the Mega Meter to get a massive shove ability!

Made for Juicy Jam 4. Didn't have much time to work on this, but hopefully someone enjoys it as is :)
